description:
A lonely little boy moves into a ramshackle apartment building all on his own and makes friends with the broke manga artist who lives next door.

(Source: Netflix)
synonyms: โคทาโร่อยู่คนเดียว

tags.name: Found Family
tags.description: Features a group of characters with no biological relations that are united in a group providing social support.

tags.name: Family Life
tags.description: Centers around the activities of a family unit.

tags.name: Tragedy
tags.description: Centers around tragic events and unhappy endings.

tags.name: Primarily Adult Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of characters above a high school age.

tags.name: Episodic
tags.description: Features story arcs that are loosely tied or lack an overarching plot.

tags.name: Coming of Age
tags.description: Centers around a character's transition from childhood to adulthood.

tags.name: Iyashikei
tags.description: Primary aim is to heal the audience through serene depictions of characters' daily lives.

tags.name: School
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a primary or secondary educational institution.

tags.name: Estranged Family
tags.description: At least one family member of the MC intentionally distances themselves or a family distances themselves from a person related to the MC.

tags.name: Cute Boys Doing Cute Things
tags.description: Centers around male characters doing cute activities, usually with little to no emphasis on drama and conflict.

tags.name: Delinquents
tags.description: Features characters with a notorious image and attitude, sometimes referred to as "yankees".

tags.name: Detective
tags.description: Features a character who investigates and solves crimes.

tags.name: Orphan
tags.description: Prominently features a character that is an orphan.

node.description:
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/erickbglx) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/erickbglx/) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/ErickDublou)

Erick Bougleux is a Brazilian actor, voice actor, and dubbing director.

Twitter | Instagram **Miguel Ángel Leal Rodríguez** is a Mexican voice actor known for being the Latin American Spanish voice of Meliodas in _The Seven Deadly Sins_, Dr. Rajesh Koothrappali in _The Big Bang Theory_ and Logan Reese in _Zoey 101_. He is the recurring voice of Carlos Pena Jr. He's the brother of Lupita Leal and Alfredo Leal Non-Anime Roles: - Josh (Watch Dogs 2) - Markus (Detroit Become Human)

**Graduated:** Waseda University, Faculty of Letters 1

**Satomi Tetsurou** is a Japanese producer and animation planner, who also provides planning assistance to various works. He is also the president of Barnum Studio, and the representative director for LIDENFILMS.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/i/user/52717833)

title.native: ひとり暮らしの小学生
学園ベビーシッターズ
うどんの国の金色毛鞠
ＣＬＡＮＮＡＤ ~After Story~ クラナド アフターストーリー
同居人はひざ、時々、頭のうえ。
